Title: Meghla Akash
Writer: Masum Reza (script), Nargis Akter (screenplay), Nargis Akter (dialogue), Masum Reza (dialogue), Chotku Ahmed (dialogue), Humayun Kabir (dialogue)
Actors: Moushumi, Ayub Khan, Shakil Khan, Purnima
Plot: Social awareness regarding AIDS and use of protection during sexual relationships.
